game_description: Massive arsenal with dozens of different weapons, including many different types depending on the player's preference: handgun, shotgun, assault, automatic and a variety of high-damage melee weapons. More special is the item and trap system, depending on your attack and defense strategy to choose the right type of trap such as: Fence, Sawblade Trap, Gun Turret, Electrical Turret, Thorn Trap, Fire Turret or Drone. 100 missions with dozens of different types of zombies and bosses will bring you a great challenge and experience. In addition, you can team up with friends to conquer the hardest challenge of the game with 100 stages.
